name: Zhong Guo
personality: quiet and reserved, but focused and determined in carrying out his duties
story: Rong Yeung grew up in a small village in eastern China, where his family had little money and struggled to make ends meet. Despite these challenges, Rong was always interested in science and technology, and he excelled in his studies. When he turned 18, Rong decided to join the army as a way to serve his country and further his education. He quickly showed a natural aptitude for handling and maintaining missile systems, and he was eventually chosen to serve as an assistant missile specialist for the OPFOR. Rong takes his work very seriously and is always striving to improve his skills.
